detail_desc: Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lined cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in crêpe jersey with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.

Straight-cut dress in a sturdy, textured weave containing glittery threads with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves and fake front pockets with a decorative metal button. Lined.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups, wide adjustable shoulder straps for good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Jersey-lined joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, a back pocket, side pockets and tapered legs.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist, narrow, covered elastication at the back and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a lined hood, cable-knit front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and hole-patterned lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and ribbing around the neckline.

Halterneck body in soft lace and microfibre with a fastening at the back of the neck, a deep V-neck at the front and low cut at the back of the top section. Lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.

Romper suit in a cotton weave with frills at the top and narrow shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Elastication at the top of the back and hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the inside of the legs (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).
Leggings in soft jersey with glittery threads. Concealed zip in the side.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.

Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.
Cropped T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a raw-edge hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with contrasting colour trims at the sides, a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with pleats front and back, a small frilled collar and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button, and a gentle flare to the hem. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a flock print on the front, ribbing around the neckline and slits at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a patterned modal crêpe weave with a seam at the waist, decorative bow at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Pyjamas in woven fabric. Short top with a V-neck, ties at the front, cap sleeves and a small frill trim around the neckline and hem. Wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic cotton weave with a frilled collar, buttons down the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short A-line skirt in imitation suede with decorative lacing at the front, side pockets and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with appliqués, a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in a cotton crêpe weave with a high paper bag waist with pleats, a detachable tie belt and buttons down the front. Jersey underskirt.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey pyjamas. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Low strappy sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, insoles and soles in rubber.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, organic cotton textured knit with ribbing and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets and straight legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves.

Short dress in mesh made from recycled polyester with a sequin-embroidered pattern. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and an embroidered scalloped edge at the top and hem. Jersey lining.

Jacket in sturdy, washed denim with a collar with a detachable tab and fastener. Wind flap and concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed button. Elbow patches, a tab and button at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Suede trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Romper suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the back, kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Press-studs on the shoulders and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved nursing top and trousers in organic cotton jersey. Top with a unique nursing feature, designed in a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Bottoms with an elasticated, V-shaped, wrapover waistband below the tummy for added comfort.
Sleeveless, A-line blouse in chiffon with sequin appliqués, a small, frilled collar, gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of pull-on shorts in cotton denim. T-shirt with a round neck and print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm. Lined.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in soft, washed, organic cotton denim with a button at the sides and straps with adjustable buttoning. Two patch pockets at the front and one at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.

Short dress in an airy weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims, and flounced trims down the front and around the hem. Jersey lining.
Wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and removable insoles, and chunky soles.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and draped front with a wrapover hem.

Double-breasted, straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with wide peak lapels, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Decorative strap at the back and a single back vent. Lined. The coat is made partly from recycled wool.
Sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length shorts in patterned cotton twill with a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Gently flared top in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and decorative gathers at the neckline and short, elasticated raglan sleeves.
Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood with reflective details and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a wide neckline, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and fastener at the back.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Bomber jacket in a patterned weave with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Trousers in woven fabric with a regular elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in the side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a regular elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Top in soft pile with a ribbed, high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Brazilian briefs in ribbed microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
